title: RIFLEMAN 104 The Marshal [retr?tv]
description:
THE RIFLEMAN -1x4- THE MARSHAL   (10/21/1958)

Micah Torrance, a once famous lawman, is introduced as a drunken derelict, who stumbles into North Fork. Micah, nursing an arm crippled in a gunfight, is hired by Lucas to help out at the ranch. Thus begins the story of how Micah becomes North Fork&#039;s full-time Marshal.
 
Starring: Chuck Connors as Lucas McCain and  Johnny Crawford as Mark McCain
Guest stars: Warren Oates (Andrew Sheltin),  James Drury (Lloyd Carpenter), Paul Fix (Micah Torrance)
Writer: Sam Peckinpah 
Director: J. Peverell Marley, Sam Peckinpah
